full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): ` BCOM LDAN 'DAS DPAL RDO RJE 'JIGS BYED CHEN PO'I SNYING PO NYE SNYING RTZA SNGAGS RNAMS KYI RJES SU GNANG BA BYED TSUL DPE'U CHUNG DANG BCAS PA BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @005A *, ,BCOM LDAN 'DAS DPAL RDO RJE 'JIGS BYED CHEN PO'I SNYING PO NYE SNYING RTZA SNGAGS RNAMS KYI RJES SU GNANG BA BYED PA'I TSUL GO BDE BAR BKOD PA 'DI NI, GSHIN RJE'I GSHED KYI RNAL 'BYOR PA CHOS SKYONG DNGOS GRUB DANG, DKA' BCU 'DZIN PA CHOS KYI RIN CHEN SA LA SOGS KYIS BSKUL BA'I NGOR, DAM PA SNGA MA RNAMS KYI MAN NGAG DANG, BLA MA'I GSUNG SGROS LA BRTEN NAS, GSHIN RJE'I GSHED KYI RNAL 'BYOR PA LHA'I BTZUN PA RIN CHEN RGYA MTSO'I BLO GROS DPAL BZANG PO BDAG GIS SBYAR BA'I YI GE PA NI, BKA' BZHI 'DZIN PA NAM MKHA' DPAL BZANG PO'O, 'DIS KYANG SEMS CAN DANG RDO RJE 'CHANG GI GO 'PHANG THOB PA'I RGYUR GYUR CIG ,
author_simple: RIN CHEN RGYA MTSO'I BLO GROS,
